title: CVPR Image Classes
description: IntroIn this kernel I explore the dataset for the CVPR competition. We are given images from videos produced as a car drives around and records activity from the car's point of view. My primary purpose is to see what's in the images and get a general feel for the objects we are asked to segment. I'll also create a data frame of labels for the train set that can be used for more in-depth analysis. Here in this kernel we'll just look at counts and distributions for the train set.
